definition: quarter (hour)/moment/to carve/to engrave/to cut/oppressive/classifier for short time intervals

sentences.english: He had to hit the bullet and give into his boss's unreasonable demands.
sentences.chinese: 是他勉爲其難，讓步接受了老闆的苛刻要求。

sentences.english: Some VCs will extract harsh terms under these conditions.
sentences.chinese: 有些風投公司就會趁火打劫，提出很苛刻的條件。

sentences.english: But this seems a little harsh.
No parabens, aluminum, propylene glycol, synthetic fragrances or harsh preservatives.
sentences.chinese: 沒有苯甲酸酯，鋁，丙二醇，合成香料或防腐劑苛刻。

sentences.english: Ease-of-use reduces training time and eliminates critical paths.
sentences.chinese: 易用性可以減少培訓時間並消除一些苛刻途徑。

sentences.english: The government decapitalized industry and commerce with harsh tax policies.
sentences.chinese: 該政府通過苛刻的稅收政策從工商界抽取資本。

sentences.english: It is, for example, used to test safety-critical systems, such as aeroplane flight controls.
sentences.chinese: 比如，它被用來測試對安全性要求苛刻的系統，比如。

sentences.english: Claim it is very harsh on cavies .
sentences.chinese: 要求是非常苛刻的豚鼠。

sentences.english: The new "Labor Law" too harsh, grass-roots enterprises suffering.
sentences.chinese: 而新《勞動法》過於苛刻，基層企業苦不堪言。

sentences.english: But there is nothing stopping buyer A from falsely or punitively rating seller B poorly.
sentences.chinese: 但是有可能，A因失誤或過於苛刻而給B一個差評。

sentences.english: Only polyol esters have been found to satisfy this demanding application.
sentences.chinese: 只有多元醇酯找到滿足此要求苛刻的應用程式。

sentences.english: He is so hypercritical that he corrects every mistake his students made.
sentences.chinese: 他很苛刻，對於學生的每個錯誤都要糾正。

sentences.english: we have a way of getting a little bit harsh on immigration laws.
sentences.chinese: 我們對移民法是有點兒苛刻的。

sentences.english: You should feel for others. Don't be too harsh.
sentences.chinese: 你應當將心比心，別太苛刻了。

sentences.english: Love is an extremely exacting usurer.
sentences.chinese: 愛情，是一個極其苛刻的高利貸者。

sentences.english: The high temperature gas and the improvement of steam parameter make the lubricant run under much more severe conditions.
sentences.chinese: 汽輪機技術的發展使得汽輪機油的運行環境更加苛刻。

definition: lit. to blow apart the hairs upon a fur to discover any defect (idiom); fig. to be fastidious/nitpick
to request/to require/requirement/to stake a claim/to ask/to demand/CL:點|点[dian3]
to regard as important/to care about
